entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Trenton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:01 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Trenton

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 08:50 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and blowing snow near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h then southwest 60 gusting to 100 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Ontario. Local amount 15 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 110. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Ontario. Local blowing snow. Local amount 15 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
